subject: Add create-tasks integration for team strategy suggestions
description:
Extend the `create-tasks` skill to suggest team strategies based on task complexity analysis.

**Feature:**
When creating tasks from a spec, automatically suggest appropriate team strategies in `metadata.team_strategy` based on task characteristics.

**Suggestion Rules:**
- **XL complexity**: Suggest `full` (benefits from exploration + independent review)
- **L complexity with testing requirements**: Suggest `review` (independent verification)
- **M complexity with many integration points**: Suggest `research` (exploration valuable)
- **S/XS complexity**: Default to `solo` (overhead not worth it)
- **Critical priority (P0)**: Bias toward `review` or `full` (quality matters most)

**Implementation:**
- Add strategy suggestion logic to task decomposition phase
- Include `metadata.team_strategy` in generated task metadata
- Document suggestion rationale in task description (e.g., "Suggested: review — critical priority with testing requirements")

**Configuration:**
- Strategy suggestions are just defaults — user can override per task or per session
- Setting in `.claude/claude-alchemy.local.md` can disable auto-suggestions

**Acceptance Criteria:**

_Functional:_
- [ ] Task creation includes team strategy suggestions in metadata
- [ ] Suggestion rules based on complexity and priority
- [ ] Suggestions documented in task description
- [ ] Auto-suggestion can be disabled via settings

_Edge Cases:_
- [ ] All tasks XS/S: all suggest solo (no overhead)
- [ ] User has global strategy set: suggestions don't override

**Testing Requirements:**
- Manual: Verify suggestion rules produce reasonable strategies for sample tasks

Source: internal/specs/agent-teams-updates-SPEC.md Section 9.3
